item.title: Shigu Insurrection
item.description: When the red overtakes the blue, it seems like that all hope is lost. But can the blue team get it together and restore the balance within? Introduction This is a reflection of my current state of mind. A rewind to the moments in the last 6 months. Tides come and go, high and low. Rainbow cycles color from blue to red, and back again. A glimpse of sapphire pass through.
